verses.verse: Now <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H5927>go<s%> up for us against the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H8462>first,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them?
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H5927>go<s%> up: <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H5927>Come<s%> up with me into my <S%H1486>lot,<s%> that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites;<s%> and I <S%H1571>likewise<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> with you into your <S%H1486>lot.<s%> So <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with him.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and they <S%H5221>slew<s%> of them in <S%H966>Bezek<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

And they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H137>Adonibezek<s%> in <S%H966>Bezek:<s%> and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> against him, and they <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites.<s%>

But <S%H137>Adonibezek<s%> <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and <S%H270>caught<s%> him, and <S%H7112>cut<s%> off his <S%H931>thumbs<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and his great <S%H931>toes.<s%> <S%H7272><s%>

And <S%H137>Adonibezek<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Three <S%H7657>score<s%> and ten <S%H4428>kings,<s%> having their <S%H931>thumbs<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and their great <S%H931>toes<s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H7112>cut<s%> off, <S%H3950>gathered<s%> their meat <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H7979>table:<s%> as I have <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7999>requited<s%> me. And they <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and had <S%H3920>taken<s%> it, and <S%H5221>smitten<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H7971>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and in the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and in the <S%H8219>valley.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron:<s%> (now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was <S%H7153>Kirjatharba:<s%>) and they <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai,<s%> and <S%H289>Ahiman,<s%> and <S%H8526>Talmai.<s%>

And from <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was <S%H7158>Kirjathsepher:<s%>

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> He that <S%H5221>smites<s%> <S%H7158>Kirjathsepher,<s%> and <S%H3920>takes<s%> it, to him will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5919>Achsah<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb's<s%> <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> it: and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H5919>Achsah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when she <S%H935>came<s%> to him, that she <S%H5496>moved<s%> him to <S%H7592>ask<s%> of her <S%H1>father<s%> a <S%H7704>field:<s%> and she <S%H6795>lighted<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> her <S%H2543>ass;<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H4100>What<s%> will you?

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3051>Give<s%> me a <S%H1293>blessing:<s%> for you have <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me also <S%H1543>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%> And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H5942>upper<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%> and the <S%H8482>nether<s%> <S%H1543>springs.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H7017>Kenite,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H2859>father<s%> in <S%H2859>law,<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8558>palm<s%> trees with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> lies in the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H6166>Arad;<s%> and they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and they <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H6857>Zephath,<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> it. And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>

Also <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> with the <S%H1366>coast<s%> thereof, and <S%H831>Askelon<s%> with the <S%H1366>coast<s%> thereof, and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> with the <S%H1366>coast<s%> thereof.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and he <S%H3423>drove<s%> out the inhabitants of the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> but could not <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they had <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>said:<s%> and he <S%H3423>expelled<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> that <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> but the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up against <S%H1008>Bethel:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with them.

And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8446>descry<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%> (Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was <S%H3870>Luz.<s%>)

And the <S%H8104>spies<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7200>Show<s%> us, we <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and we will <S%H6213>show<s%> you <S%H2617>mercy.<s%>

And when he <S%H7200>showed<s%> them the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> but they let <S%H7971>go<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4940>family.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof <S%H3870>Luz:<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> did <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the inhabitants of <S%H1052>Bethshean<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> nor <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns:<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in that <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H2388>strong,<s%> that they <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> to <S%H4522>tribute,<s%> and did not utterly <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out.

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> did <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer;<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them.

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> did <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7003>Kitron,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5096>Nahalol;<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them, and <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H4522>tributaries.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> did <S%H836>Asher<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5910>Accho,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> nor of <S%H303>Ahlab,<s%> nor of <S%H392>Achzib,<s%> nor of <S%H2462>Helbah,<s%> nor of <S%H663>Aphik,<s%> nor of <S%H7340>Rehob:<s%>
But the <S%H843>Asherites<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> for they did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out.

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> did <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1053>Bethshemesh,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1043>Bethanath;<s%> but he <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> nevertheless the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1053>Bethshemesh<s%> and of <S%H1043>Bethanath<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H4522>tributaries<s%> to them.

And the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H3905>forced<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> into the <S%H2022>mountain:<s%> for they would not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> them to <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6010>valley:<s%>

But the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2776>Heres<s%> in <S%H357>Aijalon,<s%> and in <S%H8169>Shaalbim:<s%> yet the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3513>prevailed,<s%> so that they <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H4522>tributaries.<s%>
And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> was from the <S%H4608>going<s%> up to <S%H6137>Akrabbim,<s%> from the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and <S%H4605>upward.<s%>
